content.heading: Our Story
ps: In 1966, owner Marino Osso arrived in Canada at the age of nineteen from Calabria, Italy. Being raised by two hardworking farmers, he knew the value of making an honest living and was inspired to pursue a trade. Determined to succeed, he obtained his license in Electrical Construction Maintenance from George Brown College in 1972. Marino then opened a contracting operation called Osso Electric Limited, where he dedicated twelve years to perfecting his craft. In 1984, he sold Osso Electric and began a new venture through the knowledge he developed as an expert businessman in the lighting field. Thanks to the support that we have received from the community, Osso City Lighting is now celebrating 30+ years of customer satisfaction.

Since its inception in 1984, Osso City Lighting has proudly been one of Durham Region’s largest purveyors of fine lighting. Our goal is to continuously provide you the same level of excellence that we have shown for over a quarter century. Whether it's traditional, contemporary, or anything in between, Osso City Lighting has exactly what you need. Come visit our family and see the light in what we love.

content.heading: Coronavirus Update: Ontario Wide Lockdown
ps: To help keep our community safe during this time, our showroom and all in-store shopping will be temporarily suspended as per the province-wide lockdown.
We will be available for email and phone orders as well as curb side pickup.
For any inquiries, please reach us via:
Our limited hours of operation during the lockdown will be:
We are closed Sundays and Mondays.
Please stay safe, we are all in this together. Thank you for your continued support and we look forward to seeing you soon!

suppliers.name: Dals
suppliers.description: Offering recessed, cabinet, accent, and architectural LED lighting. Based out of Quebec.

suppliers.name: DVI
suppliers.description: Design, value, and inventory are the principles DVI has branded itself upon. Keeping a strong commitment to fresh product lines in fashion – offering pricing families can afford.

suppliers.name: Eurofase
suppliers.description: Eurofase provides a diverse selection of high quality, innovative lighting. Statement chandeliers, alluring pendants, vanity & bath lights, track & recessed lighting, exterior fixtures, cabinet & display lighting, plus LED mirrors.

suppliers.name: Generation
suppliers.description: Superior quality – delivering a balanced range of price points and styles, maintaining the highest standards with materials and workmanship.

suppliers.name: Hinkley
suppliers.description: Thoughtful design, impeccable attention to detail, and quality craftmanship are the backbone of every single product released by Hinkley Lighting and Fredrick Ramond.

suppliers.name: Kendal
suppliers.description: Kendal Lighting quality and design can be found in many areas of Lighting including Fans, Fixtures, Lamps, Track Lighting, and Rail Systems.

suppliers.name: Kichler
suppliers.description: Kichler Lighting offers a variety of lighting solutions and ceiling fans to match your unique style and personality, while focusing on detail & quality.

suppliers.name: MonteCarlo
suppliers.description: Monte Carlo is a Fan company that specializes in trend-inspired, fashion-forward ceiling fans in a wide variety of models, sizes, and finishes for any interior space. Rooms come alive with style, all with premium grade motors and features.

suppliers.name: Satco-Nuvo
suppliers.description: Satco|Nuvo is a leading manufacturer of lighting solutions including bulbs, decorative lighting, functional and task lighting, as well as lighting components.

suppliers.name: Starfire
suppliers.description: Starfire Crystal is a leading manufacturer and importer of fine crystal chandeliers & other lighting that reflect the latest innovations and trends in the lighting industry.

suppliers.name: Kandil Canada
suppliers.description: Kandil is a high-end lighting distributor and a unique custom-made lighting manufacturer, with offices in four different countries.
